PUBLIC

 

Dear Aldrin,

 

Please be informed that this claim is for an old policy which is already expired.

 

As per the Land Transit clause, all claims must be notified to us within 30 days of the occurrence of such loss or damage.



 

In view of this, it is difficult for us to move forward with the claim.

 

Best Regards,

 

Vic Eldrin Munar

Non Motor Claims Executive (Property & Casualty)
